aka: My bolshe nikogda ne zabludimsia vmeste
We'll Never Get Lost Together Again
Мы больше никогда не заблудимся вместе

cast.name: 安娜·列别捷娃 Anna Lebedeva

playdate: 2020-08-23(莫洛迪斯特基辅国际电影节)
this_title: Ми більше ніколи не заблукаємо разом
trans_title: 我们再也不会一起迷失自我
My bolshe nikogda ne zabludimsia vmeste
We'll Never Get Lost Together Again
Мы больше никогда не заблудимся вместе
introduction: 27 y.o. Sasha has been hiking in a distant southern country, when he received the message that "love-of-all-his-life" broke up with her boyfriend. Excited by the opportunities, the guy left the route and rushed to the airport, but missed his flight. He has to spend the whole day in an unfamiliar mysterious city, without cash, mobile phone, wi-fi and other benefits of civilization, accompanied by young Sashka, an eccentric and beautiful girl.
chinese_title: 我们再也不会一起迷失自我
foreign_title: Ми більше ніколи не заблукаємо разом
